Title: Outlaw
Plot: Bodies start dropping and no one is safe as the search for Drew Thompson enters its home stretch.

GuestStars: Jim Beaver, Jere Burns, Ron Eldard, Sam Anderson, Matthew John Armstrong, Ned Bellamy, Julia Campbell, Grainger Hines, Brian Howe, David Meunier, Ian Reed Kesler, Abby Miller, Mike O'Malley, Michael Stoyanov, Brent
